mapper.select: SELECT no, title, chef, poster, num FROM (SELECT no, title, chef, poster, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, title, chef, poster FROM recipe ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
